title: Incredible India - Director's Cut - Travel | CNN
description:
India is a land of abundant charm, a treasure trove of diversity, and a sea of inspiration for many. The country, with its splendid culture, traditions and heritage, continues to woo millions from across the globe. #IncredibleIndia #Travel #CNN

We are here too!
Follow us on Twitter - https://twitter.com/incredibleindia
Follow us on Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/incredibleindia
Like us on Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/incredibleindia

Visit us at https://www.incredibleindia.org
captions: . this is such a vast country. i could be anywhere in the world but. here i am. it is every person's dream to be. mesmerized by the beauty of the taj. mahal. when you come here you discover instant. comfort and delight for india. for me as a designer i'm inspired by its. timelessness. as a writer i know that my chapter with. india has only just begun. food and travel are my passions do you. see what i see. here i am playing on the world class. golf courses in india. feel what i feel india has a power a. magic about it. that draws me back here each time. i can't wait to go back and discover. more. this is my eighth time here and it won't. be my last. [Music]. they are travelers not citizens of just. one nation. who find ways to make home in places. that invite them in. and india is not just incredible india. is acquirable. it won't just accept you but pull you in. with open arms. allowing your passions to find peace. [Music]. india is a personal voice. an endless profusion of everything for. everyone. it may not have all that you singularly. want. but it'll give you the one thing that. makes you richer. do you see what i see india has made me. believe in myself everywhere you go will. have a secret to share. with you anyone could give you a memory. to take back forever. you'll never feel that someone else felt. and you will never see. or someone else or someone else there is. no one in there for everyone. there are billions of indians and you. will find yourself find yours. discovers cover in india that's truly. all yours
